Text: IRFX Testing Cc Laurel Adams provided me your name to help us with the information regarding the legal contracts we are needing I am forwarding you the request that was originally sent to Laurel At this time we would like to review the contracts that are listed below as part of our deal test As we need to complete our testing by Friday the th we would like to review these contracts sometime today or tomorrow I apologize for the short notice however we received your name as the contact person yesterday Please let me know if can help us with this request If you have any questions or need additional information please contact me at Thank you Carrie Richardson Laurel We have been unsuccessful in getting the contract numbers in order to pull the contracts for the deals in our deal test We have talked with Bridgette Anderson and Anthony Campos in Global Contracts to obtain these numbers however we have had some difficulty What we are needing is the ISDA Master Agreement not the system printout for the dates listed for the following deals Deal Counterparty Name Date Merrill Lynch International Royal Bank of Canada Merrill Lynch International Citibank NA New York Goldman Sachs Capital Markets LP BMO Nesbitt Burns For this deal the system printout of the ISDA Master that we received lists the status as draft with no effective date Please provide us with an executed agreement for this deal National Westminster Bank PLC In order to wrap up our testing please provide us with the above information by noon on Thursday If you have any questions please feel free to call me at x Thank you Carrie Richardson

Re IRFX TestingI was wondering if it would be possible for you to pull the information prior to us coming to the th floor as we are under time constraints to finish this audit Thanks Carrie From Tana
